channel.title: Posts on Xueshan Chen
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Xueshan Chen

item.title: Two Sum
item.description: leetcode link note time complexity should less than $O(n^2)$ only one valid answer my solution in python class Solution(object): def twoSum(self, nums, target): """ :type nums: List[int] :type target: int :rtype: List[int] """ n = 0; for i,m in enumerate(nums): n = target - m for j,v in enumerate(nums): if (n == v): return [i,j] return the enumerate() function is used to get the index and the value at one time from an array the time complexity is $O(n^2)$ Better solution from other def twoSum(self, nums, target): d = {} for i, n in enumerate(nums): m = target - n if m in d: return [d[m], i] else: d[n] = i the time complexity is only $O(n)$

item.title: Add Tags for Hugo Articles
item.description: config.toml add below statements into config.toml file tag = "tags" category = "categories" Blog add tags into the header of the md file for example, this article, the header is: title: "Add Tags for Hugo Articles" date: 2021-10-27T10:25:39+08:00 draft: true tags: ["hugo"]

item.title: Binary Search
item.description: Base Definitions of Array elements in an array can’t be deleted, just can be rewrite in different program language, the memory management is different in java, the memory location is not continuing in C++, it is continuing Binary Search Leetcode link Given an array of integers nums which is sorted in ascending order, and an integer target, write a function to search target in nums.

item.title: Hugo create the public folder but it have not rendered
item.description: Issue When I want to put my public folder to a LAN, the html and hyper links are showed, but the subpages and the CSS (the theme) did not appear. This web can work well with the git page and the local host. Solution First, I commented the baseURL in the config.toml, but it cannot work Final add baseUrl = "//example.org" relativeURLs = true uglyURLs = true into the config.
